name: INV_EOB_PAID_CLM
description: This table holds the claim level secondary information for a non-primary claim.  It contains the paid amount and other secondary amounts other than claim adjustments (CAS).

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The invoice record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item holds the coverage ID associated with American National Standards Institute secondary information that has been edited.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_PAID
columns.description: The paid amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CONTRACT
columns.description: The contract amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_PAT_REMAIN
columns.description: The remaining patient liability amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_NONCOVERED
columns.description: The non-covered amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_01
columns.description: This item holds the value for the covered days.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_02
columns.description: The Monetary amount from the adjudication of the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_03
columns.description: This item holds the value for the lifetime reserve days.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_04
columns.description: This is the diagnosis related group adjudication amount for the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_05
columns.description: This is the claim payment remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_06
columns.description: This is the disproportionate share amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_07
columns.description: This is the Medicare Secondary Payer pass-through amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_08
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System capital amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_09
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System capital, federal specific portion, Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_10
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System capital, hospital specific portion, Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_11
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System capital, disproportionate share, hospital Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_12
columns.description: This is the old capital amount

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_13
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System capital indirect medical education claim amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_14
columns.description: This is the hospital specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_15
columns.description: This is the cost report days for the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_16
columns.description: This is the federal specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_17
columns.description: This is the Prospective Payment System Capital Outlier amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_18
columns.description: This is the indirect teaching amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_19
columns.description: This is the professional component amount billed but not payable.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_20
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_21
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_22
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_23
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_24
columns.description: This is the capital exception amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_01
columns.description: This is the reimbursement rate.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_02
columns.description: This is the claim Health Care Financing Common Procedural Coding System payable amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_03
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_04
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_05
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_06
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_07
columns.description: This is the Claim Payment Remark Code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_08
columns.description: This is the End Stage Renal Disease payment amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_09
columns.description: This is the professional component amount billed but not payable.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_DATE
columns.description: The adjudication date.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_D8
columns.description: The discount amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_DY
columns.description: The per day limit.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_F5
columns.description: The patient paid amount.

columns.name: CLM_EOB_AMT_T
columns.description: The sales tax amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_T2
columns.description: The total amount before taxes.

columns.name: EOB_COINS_DAYS
columns.description: The coinsurance days.
